EmailTemplate.name: CSM INSITE RENEWAL Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Your case {!Case.CaseNumber} is Pending Approval For INSITE Renewal Request
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
This renewal request has been completed. Your activation keys will be sent the day of your current expiration and your invoice will be sent today from our system email noreply.identity@cummins.com .
Please save this email address to your contact list to avoid the emails going to your spam or junk mail. This may take a little bit, please let us know if you do not receive your email by end of business.
If you do not receive your product on your expiration date, please reach out to marketplace@cummins.com.
Once keys are received, if you have any difficulty manually inputting the keys into your Insite, please reach out to our tech support team at one of the following –
Directions to input your New Activation Keys:
• Open Insite • Go to Manage Licenses • After the Configuration Tool Is Open, Shut Insite Down in the Background • Click on Activate Licenses/Counts put in Basic Key and hit activate; then enter the Functional Key (Lite/Pro) and hit activate • Your keys will now be active.
Thank you and have a great day!
Insite Technical Support – Contact Info
Phone: 1-800-286-6467 option 2 and then option 4 Or Email: servicetoolsupport@cummins.com Or www.Insite.cummins.com (chat with support)
This auto-generated e-mail was sent from Cummins.
